name: Disassemble Form Diagram
description: Disassemble a form diagram into its constituent parts.

outputParameters.name: node_keys
outputParameters.description: All the node keys in the form diagram.

outputParameters.name: support_node_keys
outputParameters.description: The keys of the support nodes in the form diagram.

outputParameters.name: edge_keys
outputParameters.description: All the edge keys in the form diagram.
